join_vault.description: Have a vault code? Enter it here to join a cloud vault and explore a world of recipes with up to two friends or family. If you don’t have one, consider creating your own vault!
join_vault.title: Join a Vault

error_messages.default: An error occurred. Please try again later.

login.title: Login to create a Cloud Vault!
login.feature2: Share your vault with up to 2 friends and family
login.feature3: Join shared vaults of other users

clear_database.error_message: There was an issue clearing the database.
clear_database.message: Are you sure you want to clear the database?
clear_database.title: Clear Database

copy.message: The content has been copied to your clipboard.
copy.title: Content Copied!

delete_account.error_message: Contact customer support there was an issue deleting you account.
delete_account.message: Are you sure you want to delete your account? You cannot reverse this! Any Purchases made will be lost.
delete_account.title: Delete Account

discard_changes.message: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard them and leave the screen?
discard_changes.title: Discard changes?

reset_database.message: Are you sure you want to reset the database?
reset_database.title: Reset Database

limitation.title: Why the limitation ?
limitation.description1: Our goal is to give everyone a taste by offering 5 recipe slots for free, you can explore the benefits of cloud syncing and see how it fits into your cooking routine.
limitation.description2: If you find that 5 slots aren’t enough, you can always upgrade to our Pro Vault at a later point.
